original_text: They all stood in their places around the Midianites' camp. Then the whole Midianite army ran away! They were shouting as they ran as fast as they could run.
korean_text: 각기 제자리에 서서 그 진영을 에워싸매 그 온 진영의 군사들이 뛰고 부르짖으며 도망하였는데

sentences.original_text: They all stood in their places
Then the whole Midianite army ran away
They were shouting as they ran
as fast as they could run
